en: And what can make you know what is the Inevitable Reality?
Thamud and 'Aad denied the Striking Calamity [i.e., the Resurrection].
they were destroyed by the overpowering [blast].
they were destroyed by a screaming, violent wind
Which He [i.e., Allah] imposed upon them for seven nights
so you would see the people therein fallen
as if they were hollow trunks of palm trees.
Then do you see of them any remains?
